title: Investigator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Every three nights, you learn two players and a factional role you cannot win with.
- One of those two players is that role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Have the Town win the game.

*"It is a fine night for a stroll, wouldn't you say, Mister Morozov? Or should I say... BARON Morozov?"*
